skdetail:

Invocation Name: taj mahal
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Planning a visit to the Taj Mahal? If you don't know already, there may be a few questions running through your mind like who built the Taj, why was it built So you'd want to know before you pay a visit to the Taj. Don't worry at all, as this section on "Taj Mahal facts" will provide you with a few fast facts to up your knowledge.
The purpose of this skills is to spread the knowledge about the Taj Mahal . Its main feature is to provide the facts about Taj Mahal.
It will work when you say "Alexa, Start Taj Mahal " or "Alexa, give me a fact" or "Alexa, tell me a fact"
priv:
